```{r libs, include=F}
library(tidyverse)
library(redav)
library(janitor)
library(scales)
```

```{r read-data}
jobs <- read_csv("data/NYC_Jobs.csv")
```

```{r data-clean}
jobs <- jobs %>%
  clean_names()
```

# Results

```{r plot1}
jobs %>%
  group_by(category_simple) %>%
  summarize(mean_salary = mean(salary_range_from)) %>%
  ggplot(
    aes(
      y = fct_reorder(category_simple, mean_salary), 
      x = mean_salary
      )
    ) +
  geom_col() +
  scale_x_continuous(labels = label_dollar()) +
  labs(
    x = "Average starting salary (USD)",
    y = "Simplified job category",
    title = "Average starting salary by job category",
    caption = "Source: nyc.gov"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```


```{r plot1}
jobs %>%
  ggplot(
    aes(
      y = fct_rev(fct_infreq(category_simple)), 
      )
    ) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs(
    x = "Number of jobs posted",
    y = "Simplified job category",
    title = "Number of jobs postings by category",
    caption = "Source: nyc.gov"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```
